en.title: Hong Kong
en.description:
Hong Kong is a Special Administrative Region of China, known for its towering skyscrapers, bustling streets, diverse culture, and a major hub for business, finance, and tourism. The city is situated on Hong Kong Island and the Kowloon Peninsula, with the iconic Victoria Harbour separating the two.

The average trip length in the city is less than 5 kilometers, and it takes 9 minutes to complete. The congestion index for the cityâ€™s road network in the morning peak hours is 2.4, and the value of vehicle kilometers traveled stands at 1.6 million. Emission per capita from road transportation for this economy is 1.19 Tons.
